name: MööM Mafia
description:
WELCOME TO THE MÖÖM MAFIA, BOSS TODAY WE GOT SOME BILLS TO PAY… AGAIN In MööM Mafia you play as handsome Mr MööM, the Godfather But Mr MööM, where do all of your money come from? In fact, you are the money! How neat is that? Fight your way through four challenging stages by Jumping, Jumpingand Jumping! Meet the MööM-Valley Gangsters and avoid getting hit by one! Use your health to do some investments in furniture, bananas and more! CONTROLS: WASD or ARROWS to MOVE! SPACE to pay with your money LIFE! WELCOME TO THE MÖÖM MAFIA!

GAME WAS MADE FOR LUDUMDARE 44 -GAMEJAM AS A COMPO ENTRY
